dict.acceptation: 深度；深处，深海；深奥，奥妙；进深；

sent.orig: The depth vernier gauges can be used to measure depth and step.
sent.trans: 深度游标卡尺用于测量深度，台阶等。

sent.orig: And the depth is really relative to the depth of the pool.
sent.trans: 潜水的深度与泳池的深度有关。

sent.orig: Depth control wheels - to ensure a uniform depth of the drip lines embedding.
sent.trans: 深度控制轮—确保滴灌管掩埋深度一致。

sent.orig: If the concept of the gate-depth-wall-section relalionship is accepted then the gate depth is established first.
sent.trans: 假如浇口深度和塑件壁厚之间的关系得到确认，则浇口深度首先得到。

sent.orig: Analyses the difference and back depth and presents the application of depth of field taking photographs.
sent.trans: 论述了不同情况下光圈、摄距、镜头焦距对景深的影响，分析了前景深与后景深的差别，讨论了景深理论在摄影中的应用。
